title: David Flees to Nob and Gath
summary: David flees from Saul and visits the priests at Nob, where he receives holy bread and Goliath’s sword. Then he escapes to Gath, the Philistine city, where he pretends to be insane to avoid suspicion.

faq.question: What did David receive from the priest at Nob?
faq.answer: The consecrated bread and Goliath’s sword.

faq.question: Why did David act insane in Gath?
faq.answer: To protect himself when the Philistines recognized him as a famous warrior.
